caption.p: Neurotransmitter map of the hermaphrodite nervous system.

tr.td: Newly assigned as mechanosensory (based on Sanders et al., 2013)
Classified as sensory because of expression of oxygen sensors
Only very few minor NMJs, more prominent neuron-neuron synapses
Only very few minor NMJs, more prominent neuron-neuron synapses
Due to connectivity and rudimentary sensory endings, all polymodal
